plot: Courandair dreams that he has built the ideal plane and that he is flying it with his dog Poum. But a bad storm throws the aircraft into the kingdom of Neptune, to the amazement of the fish...
title: Le rêve de l'aviateur Courandair
plot_es: Courandair dreams that he has built the ideal plane and that he is flying it with his dog Poum. But a bad storm throws the aircraft into the kingdom of Neptune, to the amazement of the fish...
plot_en: Courandair dreams that he has built the ideal plane and that he is flying it with his dog Poum. But a bad storm throws the aircraft into the kingdom of Neptune, to the amazement of the fish...
